attributes.action: allow public funding of our regiments by charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: army air force and navy regiments can then be sponsored by individuals and companies through a web based portal, people who are linked to a regiment through family and past generations or just through interest and support can contribute monthly sums or a one off contribution, the regiments can thanks them by sending a tee shirt etc as a thank you , this will help the military and give a feeling of contribution to all
